name: Dicey Guns
description:
A game where You and Your enemies stats are controlled by luck.

Controlls

w, a, s, d for movement.

m1 for firing.

Your stats are shown on the bottom of the screen.

Credits:

Skybox: assetstore.unity.com/publishers/57827

Map: assetstore.unity.com/publishers/44390

Music: patrickdearteaga.com
